channel.title: How to make a login system?
channel.description: can somebody please tell me how i can make a login system so only registered users can login to my private server? So when somebody registers on my phpbb forum i want them to be able to use the same username and password to login to my server. please help!! Thanks

Pretty sure something to do with Mysql
